meanings.definition: A person who takes care of horses at an inn or stable.
meanings.sent1: The ostlers at the inn groomed the horses every morning.
meanings.sent2: The travelers could always rely on the ostlers to care for their horses.
meanings.sent3: The ostlers decided to have a race to see who could groom the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The ostlers were the unsung heroes of the inn, ensuring the horses were always ready to go.
meanings.sent5: The image of the diligent ostlers brushing the horses under the morning sun stayed with the guests.
